name: ChaosArena
description:
!!! Leaderboard only works on Windows build !!!

Highly recommend to play Windows build

Your goal is to survive as many waves of enemies as possible and collect the most points

Control:

  • WASD - moving
  • Right mouse button - aiming
  • Left mouse button - shooting
  • Shift - sprint
  • E - open upgrade shop
  • 1, 2, 3 - special abilities(available after buying)

Enemies:

  • Gray - can punch you if came close enough
  • Red - will be shooting to you
  • Green - it will throw grenades at you

Special abilities:

  • Wall - puts a wall in front of you
  • Grenade - allows you to throw grenades at enemies to deal additional damage
  • Power smash - deals damage to all enemies who are standing close enough to you
  • Health I, II, III - you can take more damage

Credits:

  • Pistol from Kenney (www.kenney.nl)
  • song https://freesound.org/people/FoolBoyMedia/sounds/231254/

Feel free to put a comment. Every opinion is priceless :)
